benchmark_details.name: VaLLu
benchmark_details.overview: VaLLu is a meticulously curated benchmark designed for the comprehensive evaluation of the cognitive capabilities of Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) across various reasoning tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the cognitive capabilities of LVLMs in tasks that require open-ended generation and reasoning.
audience: Researchers in AI and Machine Learning
out_of_scope_uses: Tasks not focused on cognitive assessment

data.source: Combination of existing datasets such as MMMU, MathVista, HallusionBench, MATH-Vision, and more.
data.annotation: Manually filtered for noisy examples and designed for open-ended generation tasks.

methods: Expert evaluation for validation of results
methodology.interpretation: Evaluation parameters included scores from 1 to 5 based on response quality.
methodology.validation: Expert human evaluation and GPT-based scoring methods.
